** UNDER OFFER/UNDER CONTRACT**
CLYDE NORTH: The Selandra Rise estate really kicked off the boom in Clyde North and is still one of the most sought after pockets in the area. 100 Selandra Boulevard is still young, fresh and ideal for a family looking to put down some roots and begin a new life in a thriving development. With convenient access to Wilandra Rise Primary School, St. Peter's College and local shops the location is second to none!
Its dark brick facade with deep front portico sets the scene outside, while inside you will find a functional spacious floor plan complete with high ceilings and timber flooring throughout. The central entrance leads to the vast open plan lounge/dining areas complemented by the hostess kitchen complete with walk in pantry, stone benchtops and stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher and 900mm freestanding oven/stove.
There are 4 genuine robed bedrooms, the master with a walk in wardrobe and a lovely ensuite, plus a large family bathroom and second toilet. Ducted heating and evaporative cooling ensure your comfort year round, while outside there's a remote double garage with internal access plus a care free backyard that's highlighted by the decked under-roofline alfresco.
Created by well-known developers Stockland, Selandra Rise is designed around open outdoor areas creating an innovative, greener lifestyle. A uniquely planned community this terrific estate will cater to your every need. The grand plan offers a town centre with supermarket, retail and community centres, health and childcare services, Primary and Secondary schools with local employment and aged care facilities within an easy walk. You will have no trouble in creating the perfect work-life balance with the extensive parkland, multiple playgrounds catering for children of all ages, interconnected walking/bike tracks and sporting grounds!
Within a short drive to freeway access and all amenities located in the townships of Berwick, Clyde and Cranbourne this property is also only minutes away from the popular Clyde Primary School, the Casey Fields football ground and the local aquatic centre.
If you want your family to have easy access to the very best in entertainment, education and recreation then call today before it's selling, selling ..... SOLD!

Seeing is truly believing....This home, nestled in The Hunt Club comprises of 4 bedrooms, 2 living-areas and 2 bathrooms. But behold, you need to step inside to see exactly what this home has to offer.

The main living area offers a gorgeous open plan lounge, dining area and modern kitchen with a gas stove. The kitchen island stands perfectly for cooking and catching up with the family on their day.
The patio doors slide open to an impressive undercover, large decked area and demonstrates a feeling of relaxation. A place of comfort and tranquility and enough room to entertain many of your friends and relatives.
A double lock-up garage and a driveway able to accomodate one car and even an allocated off-road parking space, along with a gorgeous front garden provide the finishing touches to this already long list of offerings.
